data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3126665,"name":"Tony Romero","username":"CosmicROM","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/91b2a8/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T05:57:23.206Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eI am trying to do path planning for autonomous and am having trouble figuring out a good way to do it in C++. I really like the functionality of PathPlanner due to how user friendly it is and the convenience for non-programming people to create an auto over something like PathWeaver, but there really is not a convenient way to use it with the RamseteCommand like there is in Java that I have been able to come up with. I think I can figure out a way to use PathPlanner, but I wouldn’t be able to use the Marker function which was a big reason I liked it. I was wondering if anyone had any suggestions for how to use PathPlanner in C++ or any alternatives that provide similar
